prompts: Create a majestic unicorn-inspired Pokemon with a flowing mane and fiery spirit.
I want a Pokemon that embodies speed and elegance with vibrant colors.
Generate a fantasy creature that resembles a horse but has magical flames.
Make a graceful, fire-type Pokemon with a dazzling rainbow-colored mane.
Imagine a Pokemon that gallops through meadows, leaving trails of fire behind.
Design a beautiful creature with both fire and fairy elements in its appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that has a unique blend of elegance and fierce combat abilities.

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Fast and agile, with powerful fire attacks
